languages.text: {n}Джай ловит ваш взгляд и тут же кладет ладонь на плечо уставшего мужичка.{/n} "Да осветит Император твой путь, брат! Я Джай, а это {name}. Мы уже столько времени рядом стоим, почти как родные стали. Поделись с ближними, что привело тебя во дворец порядка?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Джай ловит ваш взгляд и тут же кладет ладонь на плечо уставшего мужичка.{/n} "Да осветит Император твой путь, брат! Я Джай, а это {name}. Мы уже столько времени рядом стоим, почти как родные стали. Поделись с ближними, что привело тебя во дворец порядка?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae catches your eye and lays her hand on the shoulder of a weary-looking man.{/n} "May the Emperor illuminate your path, brother! I am Jae, and this is {name}. We've been in the queue so long already, we're all practically family now — won't you tell us what brought you to the palace of order?"
languages.original_text: {n}Джай ловит ваш взгляд и тут же кладет ладонь на плечо уставшего мужичка.{/n} "Да осветит Император твой путь, брат! Я Джай, а это {name}. Мы уже столько времени рядом стоим, почти как родные стали. Поделись с ближними, что привело тебя во дворец порядка?"

We've been in the queue so long already, we're all practically family now — won't you tell us what brought you to the palace of order?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae catches your eye and lays her hand on the shoulder of a weary-looking man.{/n} "May the Emperor illuminate your path, brother! I am Jae, and this is {name}. We've been in the queue so long already, we're all practically family now — won't you tell us what brought you to the palace of order?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊循着你的目光，将手搭在某个看起来很疲惫的人肩膀上。{/n}“愿帝皇照亮你的道路，兄弟！我是婕伊，这位是{name}。咱们一起排了这么久的队，甚至可以算得上是一家人了。可不可以告诉我们，是什么原因让你来到了这座秩序的殿堂？”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae catches your eye and lays her hand on the shoulder of a weary-looking man.{/n} "May the Emperor illuminate your path, brother! I am Jae, and this is {name}. We've been in the queue so long already, we're all practically family now — won't you tell us what brought you to the palace of order?"

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊循着你的目光，将手搭在某个看起来很疲惫的人肩膀上。{/n}“愿帝皇照亮你的道路，兄弟！我是婕伊，这位是{name}。咱们一起排了这么久的队，甚至可以算得上是一家人了。可不可以告诉我们，是什么原因让你来到了这座秩序的殿堂？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae intercepta tu mirada y coloca su mano sobre el hombro de un solicitante de aspecto cansado.{/n} «¡Que el Emperador ilumine tu camino, hermano! Yo soy Jae y est{mf|e|a} es {name}. Llevamos todos tanto tiempo en la cola que somos casi familia. ¿Por qué no nos cuentas qué te trae al palacio del orden?».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae catches your eye and lays her hand on the shoulder of a weary-looking man.{/n} "May the Emperor illuminate your path, brother! I am Jae, and this is {name}. We've been in the queue so long already, we're all practically family now — won't you tell us what brought you to the palace of order?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae intercepta tu mirada y coloca su mano sobre el hombro de un solicitante de aspecto cansado.{/n} «¡Que el Emperador ilumine tu camino, hermano! Yo soy Jae y est{mf|e|a} es {name}. Llevamos todos tanto tiempo en la cola que somos casi familia. ¿Por qué no nos cuentas qué te trae al palacio del orden?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは目が合うと、ぐったりした男性の肩に手を置く。{/n}「皇帝の光があんたの道を照らしてくれるわ、兄弟！あたしはジェイ、こっちは{name}様。もう長いとこ列で待っているの。あたしたちみんな、家族みたいなものでしょう？秩序の宮殿に何の用か、聞かせてくれる？」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae catches your eye and lays her hand on the shoulder of a weary-looking man.{/n} "May the Emperor illuminate your path, brother! I am Jae, and this is {name}. We've been in the queue so long already, we're all practically family now — won't you tell us what brought you to the palace of order?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは目が合うと、ぐったりした男性の肩に手を置く。{/n}「皇帝の光があんたの道を照らしてくれるわ、兄弟！あたしはジェイ、こっちは{name}様。もう長いとこ列で待っているの。あたしたちみんな、家族みたいなものでしょう？秩序の宮殿に何の用か、聞かせてくれる？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae suit votre regard et pose la main sur l'épaule d'un homme à l'air las.{/n} « Puisse l'Empereur éclairer vos pas, mon frère ! Je m'appelle Jae, et voici {name}. Depuis le temps que nous faisons la queue côte à côte, nous formons presque une famille, maintenant... Et si vous nous disiez ce qui vous amène dans cet auguste palais de l'ordre ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae catches your eye and lays her hand on the shoulder of a weary-looking man.{/n} "May the Emperor illuminate your path, brother! I am Jae, and this is {name}. We've been in the queue so long already, we're all practically family now — won't you tell us what brought you to the palace of order?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae suit votre regard et pose la main sur l'épaule d'un homme à l'air las.{/n} « Puisse l'Empereur éclairer vos pas, mon frère ! Je m'appelle Jae, et voici {name}. Depuis le temps que nous faisons la queue côte à côte, nous formons presque une famille, maintenant... Et si vous nous disiez ce qui vous amène dans cet auguste palais de l'ordre ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae lenkt deine Aufmerksamkeit auf einen müde wirkenden Mann, dem sie die Hand auf die Schulter legt.{/n} "Möge der Imperator Euren Pfad erleuchten, Bruder! Ich bin Jae, und das ist {name}. Wir stehen schon so lange in dieser Schlange, dass wir praktisch alle eine Familie sind – würdet Ihr uns sagen, was Euch in diesen Palast der Ordnung führt?"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae catches your eye and lays her hand on the shoulder of a weary-looking man.{/n} "May the Emperor illuminate your path, brother! I am Jae, and this is {name}. We've been in the queue so long already, we're all practically family now — won't you tell us what brought you to the palace of order?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae lenkt deine Aufmerksamkeit auf einen müde wirkenden Mann, dem sie die Hand auf die Schulter legt.{/n} "Möge der Imperator Euren Pfad erleuchten, Bruder! Ich bin Jae, und das ist {name}. Wir stehen schon so lange in dieser Schlange, dass wir praktisch alle eine Familie sind – würdet Ihr uns sagen, was Euch in diesen Palast der Ordnung führt?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Bakışlarını yakalayan Jae, bitkin görünüşlü bir adamın omzuna elini koyuyor.{/n} "İmparator yoluna ışık tutsun emmi! Benim adım Jae, bu kardeşim de {name}. Bunca zamandır kuyrukta bekleye bekleye akraba olduk sayılır... Anlatsana, bu nizam sarayına seni hangi rüzgâr attı?"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae catches your eye and lays her hand on the shoulder of a weary-looking man.{/n} "May the Emperor illuminate your path, brother! I am Jae, and this is {name}. We've been in the queue so long already, we're all practically family now — won't you tell us what brought you to the palace of order?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Bakışlarını yakalayan Jae, bitkin görünüşlü bir adamın omzuna elini koyuyor.{/n} "İmparator yoluna ışık tutsun emmi! Benim adım Jae, bu kardeşim de {name}. Bunca zamandır kuyrukta bekleye bekleye akraba olduk sayılır... Anlatsana, bu nizam sarayına seni hangi rüzgâr attı?"
